node.title: 'Twiggy' Forrest, AGL look to turn ageing coal plants into futuristic hydrogen hub
node.alt: The Liddell power station next to inlet of water.
node.description: The mining billionaire partners with the energy giant toÂ explore the feasibility of building a green hydrogen hub on the site of the Liddell and Bayswater coal-fired power stations.
node.content:
["Energy giant AGL will\u00a0partner with Fortescue Future Industries, chaired by mining\u00a0billionaire Andrew 'Twiggy' Forrest, to explore the development of a green hydrogen hub in the NSW Hunter Valley.", "The Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) will involve a 12-month\u00a0feasibility study into the development of a hydrogen hub on the site of the Liddell and Bayswater coal-fired power stations.", "The plants are slated to close in 2023 and 2035 respectively.", "Dr Forrest will be joined in the Hunter Valley today by NSW\u00a0Energy Minister Matt Kean and\u00a0AGL Managing Director and CEO\u00a0Graeme Hunt for the announcement.", "Hunter Jobs Alliance coordinator Warrick Jordan said while hydrogen won't \"grow massively overnight\", the agreement was an important step.", "", "
Dr Forrest recently travelled to Glasgow for COP26, where he championed hydrogen.(ABC News: James Carmody)
", "
AGL champions hydrogen as jobs driver
", "AGL has previously announced plans to build a 250MW\u00a0pumped hydro facility at nearby Bells Mountain, and a grid-scale battery, solar and hydro plant\u00a0on the Liddell site.", "\"Over the next 12 months we will undertake a feasibility study which will map key operational and commercial plans for the project and enable the development of a production timeline.\"", "", "
The Hunter Valley has the highest density of coal mines in New South Wales.(ABC Upper Hunter: Jake Lapham)
", "Dr Forrest said hydrogen could play a key role in the future of regional Australia."]
